overview: The story is about Mrs. Bernard, her son, and her daughter - who participated in the secret intelligence transmission during WW2 and fought bravely with the Nazi German officers.The story is about Mrs. Bernard, her son, and her daughter - who participated in the secret intelligence transmission during WW2 and fought bravely with the Nazi German officers.The story is about Mrs. Bernard, her son, and her daughter - who participated in the secret intelligence transmission during WW2 and fought bravely with the Nazi German officers.
title: Critical Candle
